comment._content: Could be William S. Hart, the the swastika was a good luck symbol to cowboys. Very rare now days for obvious reasons.

comment.author: 74813284@N00
comment._content: Chinese also this as symbol for good luck - perhaps this came from them. I know a lot of Chinese worked the railroad..
